data.name: Jagged Farm: Birth of a Hero
data.detailed_description:
Games from friends

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1301010/World_Racing_2/


About the Game

Once upon a time, a little witty pig called Pigius decided that his brothers are oppressed.

To say more, they are in danger… Com’on, this is the same old story! All rights to pigs! Pigs rule! Viva the snouts! You know this.

Alarm! Pigs are attacking! People are in panic. Who’s gonna to save them? Who will save the humanity? The hero has come and her name is Gluk'Oza. She bravely leads her forces, her faithful infantry. Links! Links! Links! 2! 3! 4! Do you hear them march on? It’s a march of freedom.

But her grunting opponents won’t surrender. Specious swine are dying to get global hegemony! The girl in camouflage must reveal her strategic talent and stop them. Build pillboxes, place minefields and use air-defense turrets, command large armies of beavers, bears, moles and other animals. The powerful 'Officers' game engine provides wonderful cartoon-styled graphics. As for the rest, Jagged Farm is a real-time strategy game.

Destroy the Schweine :) or they destroy you.

Key Features:

  • Graphical engine based on DirectX9
  • Dynamic per-pixel lighting
  • Dynamic shadows and self-shadowing
  • 6 heroes – each one has its unique abilities
  • More than 12 units
  • AI information support: hiding zones, opaque zones, impassable zones, relief and surface geometry, units’ operation factors
  • Unique architecture and buildings for each side
  • Funny character animation

data.short_description: Animal Farm meets Real Time Strategy. Welcome to Jagged Farm: Birth of a Hero. Plan, Fight and Defeat the evil pigs with all available weaponery. With courage and strategy to victory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 Mb MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible with 128 Mb of RAM and supporting shaders version 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any DirectX-compatible

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Jagged Farm: Birth of a Hero
